title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOTIC INDUCTION ✋ Students practice 👁 Dr. Paret
description:
Here, our students put into practice some of our proprietary, breakthrough techniques. They are developed and taught in our school by Dr. Paret. This video clearly shows that absolutely anyone can master the Non-Verbal Hypnosis techniques taught in our School, and achieve easily the exact same results as Dr. Marco Paret himself.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
